feature_model.name: Simple e-shop

meta.data: family of e-shop stores, adapted from Wikipedia

feature_model.feature_tree: :r eShop(_r) :m catalogue(_r_1) :m payment(_r_2) :g (_r_2_5) [1,*] : bank trasnsfer(_r_2_5_6) : credit card(_r_2_5_7) : e-coins(_r_2_5_11) :m security(_r_3) :g (_r_3_8) [1,1] : high(_r_3_8_9) : standard(_r_3_8_10) :o search(_r_4)
